mapper.sql: a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`description`, a.`parentId`, a.`sort`, date_format(a.createTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime, date_format(a.updateTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updateTime
mapper.select: select from t_sys_organ a where a.parentId=#{parentId} and a.status=0
mapper.update: update t_sys_organ set name=#{name}, description=#{description}, parentId=#{parentId}, updateTime=now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select , case when b.id is not null then b.name else '一级部门' end parentName from t_sys_organ a left join t_sys_organ b on a.parentId=b.id where a.id=#{id}
